sources.title: The Vatican Affair (1968) Action, Crime, Adventure | Italian Movie | Subtitles
sources.description:
Gangland's Suspense-Filled Plans to Steal the Vatican Jewels!
A blind professor masterminds the theft of treasure from St. Peter's Basilica in Rome.

Original title: A qualsiasi prezzo 

This film has Italian audio, and subtitles in many languages.

Director: Emilio Miraglia
Writers: Augusto Caminito, Maurizio Costanzo
Stars: Walter Pidgeon, Ira von Fürstenberg, Klaus Kinski
Genres: Italian Cinema, Action, Adventure, Crime, Thriller

00:00 Full Movie (with subtitles)
02:01 Intrigue unfolds as characters discuss past events and upcoming plans, leading to unexpected revelations.
10:17 Mysterious events unfold as individuals are implicated in past wrongdoings, leading to unexpected consequences.
14:13 Intrigue unfolds as a retiring professor is drawn into a mysterious mission involving explosives and a valuable treasure.
21:53 Undercover mission to infiltrate Vatican with strategic plan and obstacles.
30:21 Intriguing events unfold as characters navigate through a complex situation involving a timed elevator challenge.
37:23 Mysterious events unfold as characters discuss past plans and future actions in a suspenseful setting.
47:20 Intrigue and suspense unfold as a mission at the Vatican faces unexpected challenges and delays.
1:09:32 Intriguing events unfold as characters navigate through a mysterious mission involving precious gems.
1:30:31 Investigation into stolen ancient jewelry leads to unexpected discoveries and alliances.

@CultCinemaClassics
